lead_paragraph: It has been already stated that Senator CHASE and announced his intention to act with the Democratic party in the State of Ohio at the coming election. In a speech made at the late National Free Soil Convention, at Cleveland, Mr. CHASE gives his reasons for this resolution. We copy his speech, partly to show the grounds on which he acts and partly as an exposition of the views and purposes of the Anti-Slavery party:

headline.main: Anti-Slavery Principles in Ohio-Speech of Senator S.P. Chase.

abstract: reasons for acting with Democratic party
